banner_details:
This banner features a dual-section layout with a bold promotional design on the left and a product image on the right. The left side uses a dark vertical gradient background with subtle gold-toned circular accents for a modern feel. The **"tagline"** text draws attention with large, bold yellow font, making it ideal for promotional phrases. Below it, the **"heading"** offers a product descriptor in clean white uppercase text. The **"description"** section lists product highlights with white bullet points. Pricing details stand out in yellow using the **"price"** text, accompanied by subtle white **"subheading"** text for additional info. A vibrant **"cta_background"** rectangle holds the dark **"cta"** text. On the right, the **"product_image"** showcases the t-shirt clearly against a light gray background. Overall, the design emphasizes urgency and value.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: #1A1A1A
- Dark Gray Gradient: #333333
- Accent Gold Yellow: #FFD700
- Soft Orange Gold: #FFA500 (overlay circles)
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
- CTA Button Text: #000000
- Background (right section): #F5F5F5
product_color: The product image showcases a casual fashion piece with a strong contrast in its color palette. The main color of the t-shirt is deep black (#000000), creating a bold backdrop. The brand logo "drew" stands out in bright yellow (#FFC700) with a black shadow effect, blending seamlessly yet drawing attention. The word "youngtrendz" beneath uses black text over the yellow background, ensuring readability and consistency with the overall palette. Blue denim jeans (#5B7DB1) and natural skin tones (#F5CBA7) subtly complement the bold upper contrast. The color interplay offers an energetic and youthful vibe, ideal for dynamic, eye-catching banner ads.
